attributes.additional_details: Andrea leadsom has now thrown her hat in the ring to be prime minister
attributes.background:
We the people would like Andrea leadsom to nominate herself to run for the prime ministers position of the United Kingdom. 
She has been a true campaigner for Brexit and will continue working towards what the public as democratically voted for.

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
